contest-event.event-date:
May 18, 1980 D Huddersfield & District BBA Spring Contest (Section A)
Huddersfield & District BBA Spring Contest (Section A) 10 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Huddersfield & District BBA Spring Contest huddersfield-district-bba-spring-contest-3670
None
Town Hall, Dewsbury, West Yorkshire Prizes - 1st £40 and trophy, 2nd £30. Best soloist - Dale Knapton (flugel) Hepworth. 3 bands competed.
June 23, 2016, 8:13 a.m. Jan. 1, 2021, 11:01 a.m.
1 Hepworth Band Peter Wadsworth The Crusaders
2 Yorkshire Traction Edward Griffiths Rococo Variations on a Theme of Tchaikovsky [Street]
3 Hade Edge Jack Fisher Symphony of Marches
Withdrawn Bradford Victoria G. Clayton
